name: Twisted Daylight
description:
***POTENTIAL FOR EPILEPSY WARNING***

Run from the Dyrman in a Twisted Treeline style map. Distract the monster so he doesn't eat your other friend. Destroy all three effigies hidden around the map to escape. Destroying an effigy will make escaping the game harder in some way, depending on which one is destroyed. 

Note that this project was made in only 10 weeks and that it is not 100% bug free. Download at your own risk.

CREDITS:

  • Project Management, Environment Art - Noemi Coute
  • Concept Art, Surfacing, Composition, trailer creator - Christon Tan
  • UI/UX Design and Implementation - Erika Garay
  • Gameplay Design, Programming, AI Design - Brendan Hutchins
  • Character Art, Modeling, and Animation - Jessica Hurtado
  • Programming - Dallas Van Houwelingen
  • Environment Art - Jonathan McMahan

This project was created at Texas A&M University during the Fall 2020 semester.

Special Thanks to Andre Thomas and Emma McLaughlin.
